content: @Jasun Carr FYI: I have written a tool which compares the SurveyHero and GitHub versions of the survey to see if they differ. There are a few differences, I'll try to get them in sync
(it's mostly punctuation and small grammar - nothing that should impact translation)
I had one nitpick on @Yoh Deadfall's PR here that needs to be addressed first and then I cna start the comparison

@Jasun Carr let's also make sure the translators have a mechanism for letting us know when they are done. Maybe we reach out in 1 week to ask for updates. The proposed deadline is the 22nd of November
Did a syncing run: The two versions are now in sync (at least for questions and answers, we're not checking things like explanatory text yet)
